trans-unit.source: Provides methods for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce metodi per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.

trans-unit.source: The PluralizationService class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La classe PluralizationService applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Per estendere il servizio ad altri linguaggi, utilizzare <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>in una <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>classe.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> that applies language rules that correspond to the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> che applica regole del linguaggio che corrispondono a specificato <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>classe applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Per estendere il servizio ad altri linguaggi, utilizzare <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>in una <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>classe.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that corresponds to the language rules applied for singular and plural forms of words.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>che corrisponde alle regole del linguaggio applicate alle forme singolari e plurali di parole.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto appena creato <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> culture.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> delle impostazioni cultura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>classe applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Per estendere il servizio ad altri linguaggi, utilizzare <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>in una <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>classe.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies which language rules to apply for singulars and plurals.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che specifica le regole del linguaggio da applicare per i singolari e plurali.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified word is plural.
trans-unit.target: Determina se la parola specificata Ã¨ plurale.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>classe applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Per estendere il servizio ad altri linguaggi, utilizzare <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>in una <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>classe.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
trans-unit.target: Sia il <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A>e <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A>metodi possono restituire `true` per la stessa parola.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, entrambi i metodi restituiscono `true` per la parola "fish".

trans-unit.source: The value to be analyzed.
trans-unit.target: Il valore da analizzare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the word is plural; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la parola Ã¨ plurale; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified word is singular.
trans-unit.target: Determina se la parola specificata Ã¨ singolare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>classe applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Per estendere il servizio ad altri linguaggi, utilizzare <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>in una <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>classe.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
trans-unit.target: Sia il <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A>e <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A>metodi possono restituire `true` per la stessa parola.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, entrambi i metodi restituiscono `true` per la parola "fish".

trans-unit.source: The value to be analyzed.
trans-unit.target: Il valore da analizzare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the word is singular; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la parola Ã¨ singolare; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the plural form of the specified word
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la forma plurale della parola specificata

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>classe applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: The word to be made plural.
trans-unit.target: La parola da rendere al plurale.

trans-unit.source: The plural form of the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: La forma plurale del parametro di input.

trans-unit.source: Returns the singular form of the specified word.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la forma singolare della parola specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
